1.text: And I turned back, and I shall see all the oppressions which are doing under the sun: and behold, the tears of the oppressed, and none comforting to them; and from the hand of those oppressing them was power, and none comforting to them.

2.text: And I praise the dead already dead more than the living they yet living.

3.text: And good above them two which were not yet, which saw not the evil work which was done under the sun.

4.text: And I saw all the labor and all the success of the work, for this the jealousy of a man from his neighbor. Also this is vanity and striving of spirit.

5.text: The foolish one folded his hands together, and ate his flesh.

6.text: Good a hand filled with rest, above two hands full of labor and striving of spirit.

7.text: And I turned back, and I shall see vanity under the sun.

8.text: There is one, and not a second; also a son and brother not to him: and no end to all his labor; also his eye shall not be satisfied with riches: and for whom do I labor and diminish my soul from good? Also this is vanity, and it is an evil labor.

9.text: Two are good above one, because there is to them a good reward in their labor.

10.text: For if they shall fall, the one will raise up his companion: and wo to him, the one that shall fall, and not a second to raise him up.

11.text: Also if two shall lie down, and heat to them: and to the one it shall not be warm.

12.text: And if one shall become strong against him, two shall stand before him; and a three-fold thread shall not be quickly broken.

13.text: Good a poor and wise child above an old and foolish king, who knew not more to receive instruction.

14.text: For from the house of those turning away he came forth to reign; for also he being born in his kingdom became poor.

15.text: I saw all the living going under the sun, with the second child which shall stand in his stead.

16.text: No end to all the people, to all which were before them: also the last ones shall not rejoice in him. For also this is vanity and striving of the spirit.
